channel.title: Why are ppl so toxic in this game
channel.description: i was a priest. attacked n1 by ass?, then i said im priest i got attacked. i got poison by ass. n2 i got attacked by reaper, rev a obs killed by alch n1. then i died. reaper killed by ass, somehow died. then reaper says priest is op. i saying nothing. he said priest shouldn't out themselves forever. i dont think so. then he got raged? says why im mad? im not mad i don't even know what is he talking about. who knows who killed him but not me right?

item.title: Why are ppl so toxic in this game
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
I actually find this game to not be too toxic, especially considering the number of really bad players there is. Sometimes it can be enraging to see people make really poor plays, but i don’t see that much toxicity.

I guess the mods do a good job about it.

Read full topic
item.source: Why are ppl so toxic in this game

item.title: Why are ppl so toxic in this game
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
mkoplsham:

reaper killed by ass, somehow died.

They obviously did not have the number of souls needed to protect them from being killed as the souls are essentially like the Priest’s night immunity, but they consume two souls just to stay alive

Read full topic
item.source: Why are ppl so toxic in this game

item.title: Why are ppl so toxic in this game
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Welp…

Maybe you should change your strategy, not blaming on other ppl, lul.

item.title: Why are ppl so toxic in this game
item.dc:creator: Zarlath
item.description:
Outing you’re the priest day 1 might not be the best strategy though.
After the latest Priest changes that made him inconvertible, he’s the number one target for the Unseen.

Read full topic
